term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - nucleation of phase separation in polymer chemistry
term.title: nucleation of phase separation

item.text: Initiation of phase domain formation through the presence of heterogeneities.

notes.item: In a metastable region of a phase diagram, phase separation is initiated only by nucleation.

sources.item: PAC, 2004, 76, 1985. 'Definition of terms related to polymer blends, composites, and multiphase polymeric materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2004)' on page 1997 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200476111985)
